You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zhcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&ZHcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0416/index.htm U+00416].
  * `&zhcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0436/index.htm U+00436].
